create_central_kitchen.ponder.tag.farmer: UNLOCALIZED: Items and Components related to farmer's delight automation.
create_central_kitchen.ponder.basket.tex: UNLOCALIZED: Basket can collect transported items from belt.
UNLOCALIZED: Besides facing upwards, corresponding horizontal facing is also suitable.
create_central_kitchen.ponder.blaze_stov: 创建烈焰人炉灶
潜行时，用烹饪指南右击烈焰人燃烧室以创建烈焰人炉灶
烹饪指南适用于厨锅，也可以使用其他厨具对应的指南
UNLOCALIZED: Expert chef
UNLOCALIZED: Blaze Stove can provide mechanical arm support for the Pot, so let it control the cooking!
UNLOCALIZED: Cooking can still be done even without adding fuel to the Blaze Stove.
UNLOCALIZED: The hotter the fire, the faster the cooking.
UNLOCALIZED: Of course, you can also use Block Stove to fry things directly.
UNLOCALIZED: But please note that seething fire can burn your ingredients directly.
UNLOCALIZED: Control the Kitchen
UNLOCALIZED: Blaze Stove can provide mechanical arm support for the Pot, but it needs to be configured to work.
UNLOCALIZED: Right clicking the Blaze Stove to open the Cooking Guide menu.
UNLOCALIZED: Once you assigned a valid recipe to the Cooking Guide, the Cooking Pot above will become interactive with Mechanical Arms.
UNLOCALIZED: For input, the Mechanical Arm will insert containers and defined ingredients.
UNLOCALIZED: For output, the Mechanical Arm will extract result and invalid ingredients.
使用烈焰人炉灶作为热源
烈焰人炉灶是一种主动热源，火焰越热，烹饪速度越快
不过烹饪依然能依靠被动热量完成
当然，你也可以直接使用烈焰人炉灶煎制食物
不过务必注意超级燃烧的火焰会立刻烧毁你的原料
潜行时，用扳手右击烈焰人炉灶以回收烹饪指南
create_central_kitchen.jei.transfer.copp: 原料数量超过铜锅容量上限
原料数量超过铜锅容量上限
_: Thank you for translating Create: Central Kitchen!
